name: Asociación Española del Gas
goal: Promotion of use of gas as cleanest conventional energy source. Promotion of an efficient and safe use of gas. Training on gas transmission, distribution and use. Certification of gas-related products and personnel. Legislation and standardization related to gas chains.
interests: Climate Action, Communication, Consumer Affairs, Energy, Environment, Internal Market, Trans-European Networks, Transport
euInitiatives:
Objetivos 2030 política energética y clima
comercio de emisiones
códigos de red
legislación mercado minorista
combustibles para transporte
impuestos a la energía
mercados financieros
medio ambiente.
